name: Advisory Board
precedingDialogue: Mrs mayor, as you are new to the office, the townspeople would like to know your positions on certain issues,
what you decide on in the future can affect their lives in different ways, and it's always a trade-off.
We are here to help you make those decisions along the way!
question: Our town is surrounded by valuable natural resources such as rivers, forest and mountains, would you support industries that use those resources?

transitions.label: Yes, our town can prosper from such industries.
transitions.feedback: It is important for the town to have enough money to support ourselves, but we also don't want to exploit our resources too much as that can severely damage the environment.

transitions.label: No, these industries can harm the environment
transitions.feedback: It is very good to take care when it comes to decisions surrounding the environment, as a lot of damages are hard to undo, just don't forget to make enough money to sustain the town.

name: Jimmy Cash
precedingDialogue: Mrs mayor, we have quite a bit of excess cash for city development, it is usually a good idea to invest these into something that can be useful down the road.
We have proposals from both small businesses and our local university asking us to support their projects, they all seem very interesting.
question: Would you like to give extra funding to the university or local businesses?

transitions.label: Businesses promise economic growth, lets do that.
University could be doing useful research, lets do that.

name: Jimmy Cash
precedingDialogue: There are two businesses that show the most promising growth, I have their proposals here.
The first one is making cheap and efficient electric cars so people can slowly move away from gasoline.
The second is a software company that has created an app to improve other business' efficiency.
question: Which do you think is a better use of the town's moneys?

transitions.label: I like the electric car company!

name: Jimmy Cash
precedingDialogue: There are two university groups that show the most promising research, I have their proposals here.
The first one is a material science group that is researching better building materials, this can help when the town grows in population.
The second is researching clean energy generation so when our town grows in size we can produce energy with less impact on the environment.
question: Which do you think is a better use of the town's moneys?

transitions.label: I like the material science project!
I like the clean energy group!

name: Hunter Gatberg
precedingDialogue: Hey Mum! We learnt about polar bears today, they look so cute. I would love to be able to see them one day.
question: Could you take me on a trip someday?

name: Arvio
precedingDialogue: Greetings! My name is Arvio, but people call me Arvio The Wealthy
Why? I'm the proprietor of MineCroft Coal Mines and the wealthiest coal baron on the seven mountains
My team of Geo ...erm ...geolis ...scientists, say that this town's neighbouring mountains promises bounds of wealth'
I have a proposition for you, allow me to inspect those lands and I may consider helping out this dump *erherm* town
question: So what do you say friend? Do we have a deal?

transitions.label: There's a lot of money in coal. It's a deal!
transitions.feedback: Arvio brings his crew and begins inspecting your land

transitions.label: No deal, mining for coal will ruin the natural landscape!
transitions.feedback: Arvio leaves with a mischievous look on his face
